Module eu.lilithmonodia.winestock
Package eu.lilithmonodia.winestock

Class WineStockController

java.lang.Object
eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.WineStockController
public class WineStockController extends Object
WineStockController class controls the Wine Stock application's UI. Responsible for connecting to a PostgreSQL database, fetching wine data, and updating the table view as appropriate.

  • Constructor Details

    • WineStockController

      public WineStockController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialises the controller, setting the icon image and disabling the import button.

    • importDatabase

      public void importDatabase()
      Imports the database by setting cell value factories and refreshing the view.

      This method initialises a new Task to perform the database import asynchronously, logging the progress and handling any exceptions that may occur. The import process includes setting the cell value factories and refreshing the view. Upon successful completion, the method logs that the database has been successfully imported. If an exception is thrown during the import process, the method logs an error message and sets the cursor back to its default state.

    • login

      public void login()
      Attempts to log in the user by establishing a PostgreSQL database connection. On successful login, the importButton is enabled; otherwise, it gets disabled.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the TableView by replacing the items with data from the PostgreSQL database. If an exception occurs, a suitable error handling approach may be applied.

    • closeApplication

      public void closeApplication()
      Closes the application by closing the connection to the PostgreSQL database. If an exception occurs while closing the connection, a suitable error handling approach may be applied.

    • addWine

      public void addWine()
      Adds a new wine to the database.

      It first constructs a Wine object using the provided inputs (name, year, volume, colour, price, and comment), then calls the insertWine method of the PostgreSQLManager class to insert the wine into the database. If the insertion is successful, it updates the currentlySelectedWine variable to the newly added wine, refreshes the wine table, and loads the selected wine. If the insertion fails, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue with the corresponding error message. If an exception occurs during the process, it logs an error message with the exception stack trace and displays an error dialogue showing the error message and the exception stack trace.

    • deleteWine

      public void deleteWine()
      Deletes the currently selected wine from the database.

      It calls the deleteWine method of the PostgreSQLManager class, passing the currentlySelectedWine as the parameter, to delete the wine from the database. After deletion, it refreshes the wine table and sets the currentlySelectedWine to null. If an exception occurs during the deletion process, it logs an error message with the exception stack trace and displays an error dialogue showing the error message and the exception stack trace.

    • modifyWine

      public void modifyWine()
      Modifies the currently selected wine in the database.

      If there is a wine currently selected, it updates the wine's name, year, volume, colour, price, and comment based on the values entered in the corresponding UI fields. It then calls the updateWine method of the PostgreSQLManager class, passing the currentlySelectedWine as the parameter, to update the wine in the database. After the update, it refreshes the wine table to reflect the changes. If an exception occurs during the modification process, it logs an error message with the exception stack trace and displays an error dialogue showing the error message and the exception stack trace.

      If no wine is currently selected, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue stating that no wine is selected.

    • loadSelectedWine

      public void loadSelectedWine()
      Loads the selected wine into the UI fields.

      Retrieves the currently selected wine from the wine table. If a wine is selected, it sets the currentlySelectedWine variable to the selected wine and populates the UI fields with the wine's name, year, volume, colour, price, and comment.

      If no wine is selected, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue stating that no wine is selected.

    • addAssortment

      public void addAssortment()
      Adds an assortment to the database and updates the UI.

      Retrieves the year from the assortmentYearTextField and validates it. If the year is empty or not in the format "yyyy", it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

      Inserts the assortment into the database using the postgreSQLManager. If the insertion is unsuccessful, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

      Retrieves the newly added assortment from the assortmentsTable and sets it as the currently selected assortment.

      Refreshes the UI to reflect the changes made in the database.

      Calls the loadSelectedAssortment() method to load the selected assortment into the UI fields.

      If an exception occurs during the process, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

    • deleteAssortment

      public void deleteAssortment()
      Deletes the currently selected assortment from the database and updates the UI.

      Calls the deleteAssortment() method of postgreSQLManager to delete the currently selected assortment from the database.

      Refreshes the UI to reflect the changes made in the database.

      Sets the currentlySelectedAssortment to null.

      If an exception occurs during the process, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

    • addWineToAssortment

      public void addWineToAssortment()
      Adds the selected wine to the currently selected assortment in the database and updates the UI.

      Calls the insertWineInAssortment() method of postgreSQLManager to add the selected wine to the currently selected assortment in the database.

      Retrieves the currently selected item from the notAssortmentWinesTable.

      Retrieves the id of the currently selected assortment and uses it to insert the wine.

      Refreshes the UI to reflect the changes made in the database.

      If an exception occurs during the process, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

    • deleteWineFromAssortment

      public void deleteWineFromAssortment()
      Deletes the selected wine from the currently selected assortment in the database and updates the UI.

      Calls the deleteWineInAssortment() method of postgreSQLManager to delete the selected wine from the currently selected assortment in the database.

      Retrieves the currently selected item from the assortmentWinesTable.

      Retrieves the id of the currently selected assortment and uses it to delete the wine.

      Refreshes the UI to reflect the changes made in the database.

      If an exception occurs during the process, it logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

    • loadSelectedAssortment

      public void loadSelectedAssortment()
      Loads the selected assortment into the UI.

      Retrieves the currently selected assortment from the assortmentsTable.

      If a selected assortment exists, set the currentlySelectedAssortment variable to the selected assortment.

      Sets the items of assortmentWinesTable to an observableArrayList containing the selected assortment.

      If no assortment is selected, logs an error message and displays an error dialogue.

    • resetAssortmentFields

      public void resetAssortmentFields()
      Resets the fields related to the assortment.

      Sets the text in the assortmentYearTextField to the current year obtained from IsoChronology.

      Clears the items in the assortmentWinesTable by setting it to an empty observableArrayList.

    • resetWineFields

      public void resetWineFields()
      Resets the fields related to a wine.

      Clears the text in the wineNameField, wineYearField, wineVolumeComboBox, wineColorComboBox, winePriceField, and wineCommentField.

      Sets the wineVolumeComboBox and wineColorComboBox to null values.

    • openLink

      public void openLink()
      Opens a link to the WineStock GitHub repository.

      This method checks if the Desktop class is supported and the BROWSE action is supported by the desktop environment. If supported, it opens the WineStock GitHub repository in the default web browser.

      If the Desktop class or the BROWSE action is not supported, it calls the handleError method with the appropriate error codes and messages.

      If an IO exception or a URI syntax exception occurs during the browsing process, it calls the handleError method with the appropriate error codes and messages, and the exception that occurred.

    • toggleTheme

      public void toggleTheme()
      Toggles the application theme.

      This method displays a confirmation dialogue where the user can choose between a dark theme and a light theme. If the user selects the dark theme, the application theme is set to the PrimerDark theme. If the user selects the light theme, the application theme is set to the PrimerLight theme.
